name: unlamented
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If something or someone is unlamented, people do not feel sad that it has or they have gone: The old stadium is unlamented by all but a few diehard fans. The late and largely unlamented former president gives his name to several public buildings. Opposite
lamented
More examplesFewer examplesThe sight of the football hooligans smashing up city centre bars was a reminder of an unlamented era.The company has completely reinvented itself and moved on from the unhappy times under the leadership of its unlamented chief executive.
